name: Amber Wright
body:
###What I'm doing
Currently completing a Bioinformatics Internship as part of my MSc. Systems Biology (University of Warwick, UK).  The code for this project will be released after my internship.

###What I'm working on
Current research project is part of a group attempting to establish a truth set of cancer variants by comparing and combining information from tumor/normal samples from a variety of technical and biological sequencing replicates.

###Professional Details
My CV can be found [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B4i6-FH6REsxRm9aT0ZnYkpHU1k/edit?usp=sharing)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
